languages.text: {n}Техношаман поднимает рычащее механическое кадило и вдыхает полную грудь благовонного выхлопа. Взгляд его мутнеет, и дикарь берется за бубен. Его пальцы удивительно ловко и ритмично стучат по натянутой синтекоже.{/n} "Вот так".

{n}The tech-shaman raises the roaring mechanical censer and inhales a lungful of its aromatic exhaust fumes. The tribesman's eyes grow dim, and he puts his hands on his drum. His fingers strike the taut synthetic leather with remarkable deftness and rhythm.{/n} "Like this."
languages.original_text: {n}Техношаман поднимает рычащее механическое кадило и вдыхает полную грудь благовонного выхлопа. Взгляд его мутнеет, и дикарь берется за бубен. Его пальцы удивительно ловко и ритмично стучат по натянутой синтекоже.{/n} "Вот так".

languages.text: {n}技術祈祷師は轟音を立てる機械じかけの香炉をかかげると、炉から出てくる香る気体を肺一杯に吸い込む。部族民の焦点がぼやけだし、その手をドラムの上に置いた。祈祷師の指がピンと張った合皮を、実に器用なリズムで叩きはじめる。{/n}「こうするのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman raises the roaring mechanical censer and inhales a lungful of its aromatic exhaust fumes. The tribesman's eyes grow dim, and he puts his hands on his drum. His fingers strike the taut synthetic leather with remarkable deftness and rhythm.{/n} "Like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術祈祷師は轟音を立てる機械じかけの香炉をかかげると、炉から出てくる香る気体を肺一杯に吸い込む。部族民の焦点がぼやけだし、その手をドラムの上に置いた。祈祷師の指がピンと張った合皮を、実に器用なリズムで叩きはじめる。{/n}「こうするのだ」
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}技术萨满举起轰鸣的机械香炉，吸了一口它的芳香废气，随后眼神变得恍惚。他把手放在鼓上，手指以惊人的灵巧和节奏敲击着紧绷的合成革。{/n}“就像这样。”
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman raises the roaring mechanical censer and inhales a lungful of its aromatic exhaust fumes. The tribesman's eyes grow dim, and he puts his hands on his drum. His fingers strike the taut synthetic leather with remarkable deftness and rhythm.{/n} "Like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术萨满举起轰鸣的机械香炉，吸了一口它的芳香废气，随后眼神变得恍惚。他把手放在鼓上，手指以惊人的灵巧和节奏敲击着紧绷的合成革。{/n}“就像这样。”
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Le technochaman lève l'encensoir mécanique et inhale longuement ses émanations parfumées avant de poser les mains sur son tambour, les yeux perdus dans le vague. Ses doigts se mettent alors à frapper le cuir synthétique avec une dextérité remarquable pour son âge.{/n} « Comme ceci. »
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman raises the roaring mechanical censer and inhales a lungful of its aromatic exhaust fumes. The tribesman's eyes grow dim, and he puts his hands on his drum. His fingers strike the taut synthetic leather with remarkable deftness and rhythm.{/n} "Like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technochaman lève l'encensoir mécanique et inhale longuement ses émanations parfumées avant de poser les mains sur son tambour, les yeux perdus dans le vague. Ses doigts se mettent alors à frapper le cuir synthétique avec une dextérité remarquable pour son âge.{/n} « Comme ceci. »
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}El tecnochamán alza el ardiente incensario mecánico e inhala profundamente sus aromáticos humos de escape. Los ojos del miembro de la tribu se vuelven opacos, y coloca sus manos en el tambor. Comienza a golpear la tensa piel sintética con extraordinaria destreza y ritmo. {/n} «Así».
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman raises the roaring mechanical censer and inhales a lungful of its aromatic exhaust fumes. The tribesman's eyes grow dim, and he puts his hands on his drum. His fingers strike the taut synthetic leather with remarkable deftness and rhythm.{/n} "Like this."

Los ojos del miembro de la tribu se vuelven opacos, y coloca sus manos en el tambor. Comienza a golpear la tensa piel sintética con extraordinaria destreza y ritmo. {/n} «Así».
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Der Tech-Schamane hebt das brüllende mechanische Rauchgefäß und atmet eine Lunge voll der aromatischen Abgase ein. Die Augen des Stammesmannes werden trüb und er legt die Hände auf seine Trommel. Seine Finger schlagen erstaunlich geschickt und rhythmisch auf das straffe synthetische Leder.{/n} "So."
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman raises the roaring mechanical censer and inhales a lungful of its aromatic exhaust fumes. The tribesman's eyes grow dim, and he puts his hands on his drum. His fingers strike the taut synthetic leather with remarkable deftness and rhythm.{/n} "Like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Tech-Schamane hebt das brüllende mechanische Rauchgefäß und atmet eine Lunge voll der aromatischen Abgase ein. Die Augen des Stammesmannes werden trüb und er legt die Hände auf seine Trommel. Seine Finger schlagen erstaunlich geschickt und rhythmisch auf das straffe synthetische Leder.{/n} "So."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Tekno şaman, kükreyen mekanik buhurdanını kaldırıp ciğerini aromalı egzoz dumanıyla dolduruyor. Kabile üyesinin gözleri sönükleşiyor, ellerini davuluna koyuyor. Parmakları, gerilmiş sentetik deriye büyük bir hünerle ve isabetli bir ritimle vuruyor.{/n} "Bu şekilde."
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman raises the roaring mechanical censer and inhales a lungful of its aromatic exhaust fumes. The tribesman's eyes grow dim, and he puts his hands on his drum. His fingers strike the taut synthetic leather with remarkable deftness and rhythm.{/n} "Like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno şaman kükreyen mekanik buhurdanını kaldırıyor ve ciğerini aromalı egzoz dumanıyla dolduruyor. Kabile üyesinin gözleri sönükleşiyor ve ellerini davuluna koyuyor. Parmakları, gerilmiş sentetik deriye büyük bir hünerle ve isabetli bir ritmle vuruyor.{/n} "Bu şekilde."
traits.speaker: TechShaman
